Title: Sparks of Life: The Azure Span
Description:
The tides have come in, and they've brought a bounty of life with them to the Azure Span.

It's a time for friends, family, good food, and forging new stories.
ObjectivesText: Collect 100 Sparks of Life in the Azure Span, while in War Mode.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak with Fieldmaster Emberath in Valdrakken.
